transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Amit ji namaskar.
Executive: Alok Pandey bol raha hun IndiaMART se bhagya karta manager.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Baat hui thi aapki meri yaad hoga aapko.
Executive: Sir ye aapka kuch ticket khula hua tha complaint aayi 15 tarikh ko uske regarding rating review ko leke.
Customer: Sir mujhe malum nahi hai abhi tak 13 baje ke baad. Baat hui thi koi? Koi nahi. Main kitne baje karun aapko?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is unaware of the complaint ticket.

- Wants to know when to call back.



Resolution:

- Executive mentioned about complaint regarding rating review.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after 1 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, rating, review, ticket
